# NSSharingService.CloudKitOptions

**Structure**

Constants that describe how a participant can configure a CloudKit share.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CloudKitOptions
```

## Creating CloudKit Options

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a set of CloudKit options using the specified raw value.

## CloudKit Options

- **allowPrivate**: An option that allows the participant to privately distribute the share to other iCloud users.
- **allowPublic**: An option that allows the participant to publicly distribute the share to other iCloud users.
- **allowReadOnly**: An option that allows the participant to grant other participants read-only permissions.
- **allowReadWrite**: An option that allows the participant to grant other participants read-write permissions.
- **standard**: An option that allows the participant to configure the share with a standard set of options.

## Managing the Cloud-Sharing Service

- **sharingService(_:didCompleteForItems:error:)**: Tells the delegate when the cloud-sharing service completes.
- **sharingService(_:didSave:)**: Tells the delegate when the cloud-sharing service saves the CloudKit share.
- **sharingService(_:didStopSharing:)**: Tells the delegate when the user stops sharing the CloudKit share.
- **options(for:share:)**: Asks the delegate for the participant options for the cloud-sharing service.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
